thread.title: Great place to say
thread.title_full: Great place to say - Review of Distrikt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: philliscopeland
title: Great place to say
text: My husband planned our trip to New York to celebrate my birthday. We wanted to be walking distance from Time Square. The Distrikt Hotel was perfect. This hotel is not too big and very friendly. The staff, especially the front desk, were to friendly. Faye gives everyone a beautiful smile and warm welcome as so all the staff. They really wanted everyone to have the best time and positive experience in NYC and the Distrikt Hotel! If we are lucky enough to return, we will stay here again some day.
